articles.author: Margaux MacColl
articles.title: SoftBank CEO announces a $100 billion investment into the US - TechCrunch
articles.description: On Monday, Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son announced that his company would invest $100 billion into the US over the next four years.
articles.content:
On Monday, SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son joined President-elect Donald Trump to announce that his company would invest $100 billion into the U.S. over the next four years. 
In a press conference at Tru… [+669 chars]

articles.title: Nvidia App could be affecting your framerate as user reports 15% or better performance after uninstalling it - PC Guide - For The Latest PC Hardware & Tech News
articles.description: The new Nvidia App was released in November this year, but the app seems to be causing performance issues for some people, especially in UE5.
